courseDetails.title: Developing Business Partnerships: The Complete Guide
courseDetails.shortDescription: Strategic Partnering, Negotiation, and Growth: Your Complete Guide to Building Strong Business Partnerships
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you a business professional, entrepreneur, or manager looking to unlock the power of strategic collaborations? Have you struggled to find the right partners or ensure your partnerships thrive? Building strong business partnerships is not just a skill—it’s a game-changer for achieving mutual growth and success.

In Developing Business Partnerships, you’ll dive deep into the art and science of identifying, building, and growing impactful business relationships. This course is packed with actionable insights, real-world examples, and tools designed to help you achieve your partnership goals. Whether you’re aiming to create your first partnership or enhance an existing one, this course is your roadmap to success.

In this course, you will:

  • Discover the transformative role of business partnerships in driving growth and innovation.

  • Identify and evaluate potential partners based on synergy, cultural fit, and strategic goals.

  • Master the art of crafting win-win agreements and negotiating for success.

  • Develop strategies for managing and scaling partnerships for long-term impact.

  • Analyze successful partnerships through engaging case studies and actionable insights.

Why focus on business partnerships?

In today’s interconnected world, strategic partnerships are crucial for staying competitive, entering new markets, and delivering enhanced value to customers. By learning how to cultivate these relationships, you position yourself and your business for sustained growth and innovation.

Course activities include:

  • Engaging video lectures covering all essential topics for partnership success.

  • Practice assignments to help you define goals, evaluate partners, and create actionable plans.

  • Interactive quizzes to reinforce key concepts.

  • Real-world case studies that showcase successful partnerships and provide actionable insights.

This course offers a blend of theoretical knowledge and practical application, making it ideal for learners at all levels. Whether you’re starting from scratch or refining your partnership strategies, Developing Business Partnerships is your comprehensive guide.

Join us today and take the first step toward building partnerships that drive growth, innovation, and mutual success!
targetAudiences: Corporate professionals aiming to enhance their skills in managing cross-company partnerships.
Business development managers eager to refine their approach to evaluating and negotiating partnerships.
Entrepreneurs who want to expand their business through strategic collaborations.
Small business owners seeking to identify and partner with complementary businesses for growth.
Startup founders looking to establish partnerships that drive innovation and market presence.
Freelancers and consultants wanting to build mutually beneficial relationships with clients and organizations.

courseDetails.title: Diseña Espacios para Todos. Accesibles, Adaptados y Seguros
courseDetails.shortDescription: Conoce los Fundamentos Más Importantes para Proyectar Espacios y Ambientes Accesibles, Inclusivos y Seguros
courseDetails.longDescription:
Diseña Espacios para Todos. Accesibles, Adaptados y Seguros

Conoce los Fundamentos Más Importantes para Proyectar Espacios y Ambientes Accesibles, Inclusivos y Seguros

Instructores: Arq. Álvaro García, Arq. Lucía Fernández y Arq. Técnica Sabina García.  Actualizado: Agosto del 2024  Estudiantes: +3.800 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:

Un curso que aborda el diseño de espacios que son accesibles y útiles para todas las personas, independientemente de su edad, tamaño, habilidad o discapacidad.

Mediante la aplicación de la normativa vigente sobre la mejora de la accesibilidad y la supresión de barreras arquitectónicas y en la comunicación, en el ámbito del urbanismo, la edificación, la vivienda, los medios de transporte, los sistemas de comunicación, el mobiliario y elementos urbanos, la señalización e información, etc.; nuestro entorno nos permitirá a cualquier persona sea cual sea su capacidad, su utilización y su máxima autonomía personal.

Por tanto, si diseñamos nuestro entorno pensando en las características de las personas con grandes discapacidades mejoraremos nuestra calidad de vida; porque por donde pasa una persona que utiliza una silla de ruedas para desplazarse seguro que pasará todo el mundo con más facilidad, y si pensamos en la señalización apta para personas con deficiencias visuales y/o auditivas, seguro que todos nosotros que vemos y oímos lo podremos hacer aún mejor; y sobre todo teniendo presente que cuando lleguemos a mayores podremos hacer una vida mucho más autónoma que nuestros padres, gracias a estas soluciones.


Objetivos:

  • Aplicar la Accesibilidad Desapercibida en todos los ámbitos de nuestro entorno.

  • Incorporar la Accesibilidad tanto a nivel de diseño de espacios y elementos, como mejora de la integración de las personas con discapacidades, temporales o permanentes, y también las personas mayores.

  • Nuevas medidas en la arquitectura y Construcción de este nuevo siglo, casi sin modificar las existentes, aptas para

courseDetails.title: Day Trading Guide: How To Make Money Day Trading
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Day Trading: Strategies, Tools, and Risk Management for Success in the Fast-Paced Financial Markets
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you ready to take control of your financial future and unlock the potential of day trading? Join us in this comprehensive course, designed for aspiring traders and seasoned investors alike, as we delve into the exciting world of day trading.


In "Day Trading Guide: How To Make Money Day Trading," you will learn how to navigate the dynamic landscape of day trading with confidence and skill. Our course covers everything from foundational concepts to advanced strategies that can help you capitalize on market movements and maximize your profits.


Throughout the course, you’ll discover essential techniques for analyzing market trends, understanding technical indicators, and interpreting chart patterns. You will learn how to read different types of charts—line, bar, and candlestick—and recognize key formations that indicate potential buy or sell signals. With practical insights and actionable advice, you’ll be equipped to make informed trading decisions and seize opportunities as they arise.


Risk management is a cornerstone of successful trading, and our course places a strong emphasis on this critical aspect. You will learn how to identify potential risks in your trades and develop effective strategies to mitigate them. We will guide you in setting appropriate stop-loss and take-profit levels, ensuring that you protect your capital while maximizing potential gains. Understanding and managing risk will give you the confidence to navigate the often volatile trading environment.


Additionally, we delve into the psychological aspects of trading, which are just as crucial as the technical and fundamental analysis. Day trading can be emotionally taxing, and maintaining a disciplined mindset is vital for long-term success. You’ll learn how to manage emotions like fear, greed, and overconfidence, which can often cloud judgment and lead to costly mistakes. Strategies for maintaining emotional resilience and discipline will be explored, allowing you to approach trading with clarity and composure.


What sets this course apart? You’ll have access to real-world examples, proven strategies, and a supportive community of fellow traders. We will provide you with numerous case studies and simulations to practice your skills in a risk-free environment before you start trading with real capital. This hands-on experience will help reinforce your learning and build your confidence.


By the end of this course, you will be empowered to:


  • Develop a solid foundation in day trading concepts and terminology.

  • Implement effective trading strategies tailored to various market conditions.

  • Analyze charts and use technical indicators to inform your trading decisions.

  • Manage risk and control emotions to enhance your trading discipline and performance.

  • Create and refine a personalized trading plan that aligns with your financial goals and risk tolerance.


This course is suitable for anyone with an interest in day trading, whether you are a complete beginner or someone looking to refine your existing skills. With flexible learning options, you can progress at your own pace—whenever and wherever you choose.


Don’t miss out on this opportunity to transform your financial future! Enroll now and take the first step toward mastering day trading and achieving your financial independence. Your journey to becoming a successful day trader starts here—let's embark on this exciting adventure together!
targetAudiences: Aspiring Traders This group includes individuals who are new to trading and are looking to learn the fundamentals of day trading. They may have little to no prior experience and are seeking structured guidance to understand the key concepts, tools, and strategies necessary for success in the day trading arena.

Part-Time Traders This group consists of individuals who may have some experience in trading but wish to enhance their skills and knowledge to trade more effectively on a part-time basis. They are looking to refine their trading strategies, improve their risk management techniques, and develop a better understanding of market analysis to optimize their trading performance alongside other commitments.

Investors Transitioning to Active Trading This group includes seasoned investors who primarily engage in long-term investing and are interested in transitioning to a more active day trading approach. They may already have a solid understanding of financial markets but seek to adapt their strategies to capitalize on short-term price movements, requiring a deeper exploration of day trading techniques and psychological aspects of active trading.

courseDetails.title: Online Reputation Management Guide: Outrank Negative Links
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Online Reputation Management: Strategies for Building Trust and Credibility in the Digital Age
courseDetails.longDescription:
In today's digital landscape, your online reputation can make or break your personal brand or business success. Whether you're an entrepreneur, marketing professional, or job seeker, mastering the art of online reputation management is essential. This comprehensive course is designed to equip you with the tools, techniques, and strategies needed to build, maintain, and protect your online image effectively.


Join us as we explore the fundamentals of online reputation management, including how search engines influence perceptions and the importance of social media engagement. You'll learn to leverage powerful monitoring tools to stay informed about what is being said about you or your brand across the internet, enabling you to respond promptly and effectively to any challenges that arise.


What can you expect from this course?


  • Practical Insights: Discover real-world case studies that illustrate both successes and failures in reputation management. We will analyze how different individuals and organizations have navigated reputation challenges, providing you with valuable lessons to apply to your own situation. These insights will help you avoid common pitfalls and implement proven strategies that yield results.

  • Hands-On Strategies: Gain actionable knowledge on using SEO (Search Engine Optimization), content creation, and social media to bolster your online presence. You will learn how to optimize your content for search engines, ensuring that positive information ranks higher and is more visible to your audience. This proactive approach not only enhances your reputation but also positions you as an authority in your field.

  • Crisis Management Techniques: In the digital age, a crisis can occur at any moment. Learn how to respond to reputational crises with confidence and professionalism. We will cover effective communication strategies that allow you to address negative feedback, manage public perception, and rebuild trust with your audience. Being prepared for a crisis is essential for protecting your brand and maintaining credibility.

  • Building a Positive Online Persona: We will delve into the importance of establishing a consistent and authentic online persona. You will learn how to craft compelling narratives that resonate with your audience, fostering emotional connections that strengthen your brand. By understanding the nuances of personal branding, you can enhance your credibility and make a lasting impression.

  • Continuous Improvement: Reputation management is not a one-time task; it requires ongoing effort and adaptation. Develop a long-term reputation management strategy that evolves with the digital landscape. Learn how to set measurable goals, assess your progress, and refine your strategies to ensure that your online presence remains positive and relevant over time.


By the end of this course, you will have a robust understanding of online reputation management and the skills necessary to create a positive online image that opens doors to new opportunities. You’ll walk away with practical tools you can implement immediately, empowering you to take control of your online narrative and enhance your personal or business brand.


Don’t leave your reputation to chance—enroll today and take the first step toward mastering your online presence! With expert guidance, engaging content, and a community of like-minded learners, you’ll be well-equipped to navigate the complexities of online reputation management and achieve your goals.

courseDetails.title: Agile Kanban: Kanban for Software Development Teams
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the Kanban way of Agile Project Management | Prepare for Kanban Certification | Kanban for Software Development
courseDetails.longDescription:
[November 2022 update]

  • Added a video on Service level expectation and how it is used in Kanban-based project management

  • Added more videos on Agile and flow metrics which are used to measure performance

Kanban is not a software development lifecycle methodology or an approach to project management.

It requires that some process is already in place so that Kanban can be applied to

incrementally change the underlying process.

—David Anderson, Kanban

Kanban is a popular framework used to implement agile and DevOps software development. It requires real-time communication of capacity and full transparency of work. Work items are represented visually on a kanban board, allowing team members to see the state of every piece of work at any time.

A Kanban board is an agile project management tool designed to help visualize work, limit work-in-progress, and maximize efficiency (or flow).

It can help both agile and DevOps teams establish order in their daily work. Kanban boards use cards, columns, and continuous improvement to help technology and service teams commit to the right amount of work, and get it done!

This course will help you explore how working on an Agile project using Kanban has benefits for your development team, your end users, and your organization as a whole.

We will identify various process flow related issues including too much work in progress, underutilization of resources, lengthy tasks, unequal sized tasks etc. using simple and easy to understand demonstrations on Kanban board.

We will not only identify these inefficiencies but also solve for the same by continuously improving the process flow using Kanban Board.

Here is a list of the topics we will cover in this course:

  • Introduction to Kanban & Kanban Board

  • Finding Inefficiencies in the Process

  • Limiting Work in Progress

  • Under utilization of Resources

  • Unequal Sized Tasks

  • Marking the Tasks

  • Other Inefficiencies/Issues

Kanban Practices

This course is ideal for software developers, project managers, software leadership, or anyone that would have an interest and gain benefit from running an Agile project and delivering maximum value early to your customers.

Welcome to the course on Kanban Flow Metrics!

About Kanban Flow Metrics

In order to build successful & productive teams, establishing a stable workflow is important. A stable workflow helps your organization to deliver the product faster and with greater customer value.

But how can you measure the success rate of your workflow and improve it?

The answer is simple - with statistically significant data.

And it is therefore essential to track the right metrics in order to make meaningful tweaks to your Kanban workflow and setup.

With Kanban metrics, you will be able to understand how your team is performing and where they need to improve. The key focus area for these metrics are measuring “time to value” or “time to market” thereby generating direct business value.

With Kanban metrics, you don’t need to guess when project work will be done, as they give you hard data on the productivity, efficiency, and reliability of your production process.

About the course

In this course, we'll be discussing the key Kanban Flow Metrics, the relationship between them and the charts you should be following to track the progress of your workflow.

Please find below the key Kanban metrics we are going to cover in this course:

  • Work in progress

  • Cycle Time

  • Lead Time

  • Throughput

  • Work Item Age

Along with the above metrics, we are also going to cover Cummulative Flow Diagram followed by in-depth coverage of Little's Law for a stable flow. We will also take you through some practical exercises for better understanding of these metrics & their application.

This course is ideal for software developers, project managers, software leadership, or anyone who is looking to build productive teams and delivering maximum value early to their customers.

Here are some FAQs about Scrum before you get started:

What is Scrum?

Scrum is a framework within which people can address complex adaptive problems, while productively and creatively delivering products of the highest possible value.

Scrum itself is a simple framework for effective team collaboration on complex products. The definition of Scrum consists of roles, events, artifacts, and the rules that bind them together.

Scrum defines three roles, the Product Owner, Scrum Master and Development Team Member.

Scrum is:

  • Lightweight

  • Simple to understand

  • Difficult to master

What is the difference between Scrum and Agile Development?

Agile Development is a software methodology, whereas Scrum is one of process frameworks that follows Agile. Scrum is advised to teams with experienced team members as the Framework requires great collaboration and self-organization as well. If the Scrum rules are not followed strictly, a project can lead to failure. Hence, it is necessary to have a proper understanding of Scrum concepts among the entire team.

Why do we need Scrum?

You don’t “need” it, per se.

But to be successful at building products and services which generate value for your customers and your business in rapidly changing circumstances, you do need a way of managing risk, optimizing value and navigating complexity in both the work and the surrounding environment. Scrum provides a framework for doing that.

When should I choose Scrum?

Scrum best serves the projects with unclear details and specifications, ones with high risk of mid-project changes, where there is a need to monitor the value of completed tasks throughout and where teams need autonomy and creativity to produce the best results.

With Scrum your team will:

  • Deliver the main value quicker

  • Have a bigger chance of meeting the deadline

  • Create the product for less

  • Be more motivated

  • Collaborate better

  • Be more innovative and listen to client requirements more careful

When should I not choose Scrum?

Scrum application can be complicated in large teams or those very attached to the traditional process. It will also not be a good fit for those that expect a light and quick change into better results. Otherwise, it simply takes determination and will to take on the process and adapt it to your needs.

Is Scrum Master a job title or a role that someone with an existing job title fills?

Scrum Master is a role that someone with a job title fills. Normal practice is that the person playing the role of project manager plays the ScrumMaster’s role as well.

Can Product Owner and ScrumMaster’s roles be played by the same person?

No, since the ownership differs. The role of Product Owner and ScrumMaster are very much mutually exclusive. Product Owner takes care of the Product Backlog, Prioritization of User Stories, and Validation of the working product increment with the user stories allocated to the Sprint.

How might Scrum work for research projects?

Scrum can be applied to any project where the goal is to maximize the value of something (a “product”), and thus requires short feedback loops in order to govern what actually gets delivered and ends up being valuable. Research fits nicely in this category because, by definition, it is about learning something in order to achieve a broader purpose.

What about Professional Scrum Certification?

There are various Professional Scrum Certifications available including Professional Scrum Master™, Professional Scrum Product Owner™, Professional Scrum Developer™, Scaled Professional Scrum™, Professional Scrum™ with Kanban, Professional Agile Leadership™ and Professional Scrum™ with User Experience.

These assessments cover a range of areas related to the knowledge and real world usage of Scrum. Passing these credible and consistent assessments is highly regarded as true industry certification by individuals, organizations and industry associations.

You can visit the official Scrum website for more details.

You'll discover how to analyze price movements using essential tools and indicators such as moving averages, Bollinger Bands, and the Relative Strength Index (RSI). We’ll delve into the intricacies of reading forex charts, including line, bar, and candlestick charts, empowering you to make informed trading decisions based on market trends and patterns.


We understand that forex trading is not just about numbers; it’s also about understanding the market environment. This course will introduce you to fundamental analysis, where you'll learn how economic indicators, such as GDP, inflation rates, and employment figures, impact currency values. You'll also explore how geopolitical events and central bank policies shape market sentiment, allowing you to anticipate potential price movements effectively.


But that's not all! This course goes beyond theory; you'll learn proven trading strategies tailored for different trading styles. Whether you prefer the fast-paced action of scalping, the strategic approach of day trading, or the long-term vision of swing and position trading, we have you covered. Each strategy is presented with clear, actionable steps and real-world examples, ensuring you can implement them in your trading.


Risk management is crucial in forex trading, and this course emphasizes techniques to help protect your capital. You'll learn how to calculate position sizes, set stop-loss and take-profit orders, and utilize leverage wisely. Our approach ensures that you can navigate the markets with confidence, minimizing risks while maximizing potential rewards.


Furthermore, we delve into the psychological aspects of trading, which are often overlooked yet vital for success. You'll gain valuable insights into managing emotions, maintaining discipline, and cultivating the patience required for effective trading. Understanding trading psychology will help you avoid common pitfalls, enabling you to make rational decisions even in the face of market volatility.


By the end of this course, you will not only have a solid understanding of forex trading but also the confidence to implement your own trading strategies. You'll have the skills necessary to analyze the market, adapt to changing conditions, and refine your approach based on performance.


Join our community of aspiring traders and take the first step towards financial independence through forex trading. Our engaging content, supportive community, and comprehensive resources will guide you every step of the way. Enroll today and start your journey towards mastering forex trading!

courseDetails.title: Migra un Sitio Web de WordPress a otro Dominio o Hosting
courseDetails.shortDescription: Migra un sitio web de WordPress a otro dominio o hosting, sin saber de programación, de forma fácil y simple.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS APRENDER A MIGRAR UN SITIO WEB DE WORDPRESS A OTRO DOMINIO O HOSTING?


Únete a nuestro curso para mostrarte cómo migrar un sitio web de WordPress completo a otro dominio o hosting, para dicho proceso, podemos utilizar uno de estos dos plugins: All in One WP Migration o SiteGround Migrator.


All in One WP Migration es un plugin que facilita la migración de un sitio hecho en WordPress de forma rápida y sencilla.


Permite exportar todo el contenido como entradas, post, plugins, base de datos, imágenes, temas, etc.


Para realizar este proceso no necesitas ningún tipo de conocimiento técnico ni de programación, ya que se realiza de una forma fácil y veloz.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin All in One WP Migration, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Instalar el plugin All-in-One WP Migration.

  • Dar clic al botón de exportar para compilar tu base de datos, archivos de medios, plugins, y temas en un archivo compacto.

  • Desempacar el archivo en la nueva ubicación o dominio con una función de “arrastrar y soltar” fácil de usar en el panel de WordPress de tu nuevo sitio web.


SiteGround Migrator es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround que nos ayuda a migrar un sitio web con WordPress a tu cuenta en SiteGround desde cualquier otra compañía de alojamiento web.


Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin SiteGround Migrator, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Generar un token de migración en el Site Tools de SiteGround.

  • Instalar el plugin SiteGround Migrator en tu WordPress.

  • Pegar el token de migración en el plugin para comenzar la migración.

  • Comprobar tu sitio y actualizar los registros DNS para terminar la migración.

Mi nombre es Renato y soy el creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en el sector del marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), más de 80 MILLONES de reproducciones y miles de comentarios en mis tutoriales, tales como estos:

Through a balanced, in-depth approach, you’ll gain insights into the hurdles AI must overcome, the ethical dilemmas it presents, and the guiding principles that shape responsible AI development.

What You’ll Learn:


  1. AI Challenges: Discover the core challenges limiting AI’s potential, including energy consumption, data privacy, job displacement, transparency, and ethical concerns.

  3. Values and Guidelines for AI: Learn about the five foundational values for ethical AI — inclusive growth, human rights, transparency, robustness, and accountability. These values offer a framework to ensure AI serves humanity responsibly.

  4. Policy Recommendations: Understand the essential steps policymakers can take to foster a trustworthy AI ecosystem. Topics include investment in AI research, building human capacity, and establishing international cooperation for a sustainable AI future.


Who Should Enroll:

This course is perfect for anyone interested in AI, from beginners to professionals, policy enthusiasts, and anyone curious about the ethical and social implications of AI. No prior technical knowledge is required!

Join us to develop a comprehensive understanding of AI’s promises, challenges, and ethical responsibilities.
